newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies 25 bond issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies 25 bond issues for insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp. said on Tuesday that it qualified for bond insurance the following 25 municipal bond issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Alum Rock Elem SD, Calif., $12 million general obligations.
--Antioch Area Public Facility, Calif., $18.45 million is a direct purchase.
--Santa Clara, Calif., $16.5 million COPs
--Waukee Comm SD, Iowa, $2.3 million school GOs.
--Evansville Wtr Dist, Ind., $13.250 million water bonds.
--Agawam, Mass., $3.04 million muni purpose loan GOs.
--Needham, Mass., $7.43 million GOs.
--Wyoming, Mich., $2.12 million transportation fund bonds and $3.055 million revs.
--Andover, Minn., $6.315 million GO improvement.
--Rosemount, Minn., $2.8 million GO improvement.
--Lees Summit, Mo., $12 million GO improvement.
--New Hampshire Muni BD BK, $27.845 million Series A & B.
--Mantua, N.J., $1.845 million GOs.
--Orange Twp, N.J., $5.675 million school district bonds
--Brewster CSD, N.Y., $9.6 million school district bonds.
--Shikellamy SD, Pa., $4.995 million GOs is a direct purchase under alternate bidding.
--Collin CCd, Texas, $6.620 million revs.
--Williamson County, Texas, $3 million GOs, $9.1 million tax & rev certificates and $15 million road bonds.
--Sparta, Wis., $1.6 million corporate purpose GOs.
--Sparta, Wis., $795,000 GOs.
--U.S. Municipal Desk, 212-859-1650
